text:
@cnnbrk So the ignorant anti-vaxer who has gone on record to say he wouldn't take a Covid-19 vaccination has now gone out and helped spread the deadly disease!
As a tennis player I think you are great but on this issue you are an ignorant moron that needs to sit the fuck down and STFU!
